reviews.review_msg: He is a true gem. He kept it simple enough for class. Pay attention in class and you"ll get a good grade. but if you want to learn quant he is the prof you go to. You will use his approach and methods for the rest of your life in finance. He is more than a professor and can teach you how to think (in Finance). Also the most knowledgeable prof...

Very nice guy, and he possesses great class notes. The midterm was fine and the final was harder. No issue with that. The big concern that I and others have is he is too theoretical and not practical experience. This was evident in how he taught the course. I hate to say it but we think he should be retired by now.
